name: Beat Saber made in 15 minutes game - Oculus Rift & Quest 1&2
name_original: Beat Saber made in 15 minutes game - Oculus Rift & Quest 1&2
description:
Part of a challenge to create  a vr game in 15 minutes. I chose one of my favorite games on VR.

I pretty pleased with the result given the time, it's far from perfect but it was a fun challenge none the less.

Gameplay is exactly like beat saber, swing the light sabers on the glowing directions of the squares.

MUST HAVE OCULUS RIFT OR QUEST HEADSET TO PLAY.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS BELOW
